00012 IntroState::IntroState() {
00013         this->background = IMG_Load(Setting::BACKGROUND.c_str());
00014         if (!this->background) {
00015                 cerr << "Image could not load!";
00016         }
00017 
00018         this->menuChoice = EMPTY_MENU;
00019 }
00020 
00021 IntroState::~IntroState() {
00022         if (NULL != this->background) {
00023                 SDL_FreeSurface(this->background);
00024                 this->background = NULL;
00025         }
00026 }
00027 
00028 void IntroState::draw(SDL_Surface* surface) {
00029 
00030         // To avoid redrawing every tick when nothing have actually changed.
00031         if (!this->reDraw) {
00032                 return;
00033         } else {
00034                 this->reDraw = false;
00035         }
00036 
00037         SDL_Rect rect;
00038         rect.x = 0;
00039         rect.y = 0;
00040         SDL_BlitSurface(this->background, NULL, surface, &rect);
00041 
00042         // white
00043         SDL_Color color = { 255, 255, 255, 0 };
00044 
00045         // Print out menu
00046         Draw::text(surface, "Rebellious Tower Defence", color, 50, 50, 100, 100);
00047         Draw::text(surface, "Play Game", color, 100, 200, 90, 100);
00048         Draw::text(surface, "Highscore", color, 100, 300, 90, 100);
00049         Draw::text(surface, "Help", color, 100, 400, 90, 100);
00050         Draw::text(surface, "Information", color, 100, 500, 90, 100);
00051         Draw::text(surface, "Exit", color, 100, 600, 90, 100);
00052         Draw::text(surface, "Make your own map", color, 740, 640, 30, 100);
00053 
00054         if (this->menuChoice == PLAYGAME) {
00055                 // background
00056                 boxRGBA(surface, 520, 180, 950, 590, 0, 0, 0, 100);
00057 
00058                 // menu active
00059                 Draw::text(surface, "Play Game", color, 100, 200, 90);
00060                 Draw::text(surface, "Select map to play", color, 650, 200);
00061 
00062                 // lookup maps
00063                 vector<string> files = AbstractGameState::getFilesInDir(
00064                                 Setting::MAP_DIR);
00065 
00066                 // scroll
00067                 if (-this->scrollOffset >= static_cast<int> (files.size()) * 30 - 300
00068                                 && static_cast<int> (files.size()) > 10) {
00069                         this->scrollOffset = -(files.size() * 30 - 300);
00070                 }
00071                 Draw::scroll(surface, color, 890, 250, 20, 320, this->scrollOffset,
00072                                 static_cast<int> (files.size()));
00073 
00074                 // Filter and show maps
00075                 int x = 250 + this->scrollOffset;
00076                 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < files.size(); i++) {
00077                         if (x >= 250 && x <= 520) {
00078                                 size_t mapname_pos = files[i].find_last_of('.');
00079                                 string map = files[i].substr(0, mapname_pos);
00080                                 Draw::text(surface, map, color, 550, x);
00081                         }
00082                         x += 30;
00083                 }
00084 
00085                 //              // upper scroll-arrow
00086                 //              filledTrigonRGBA(surface, 900, 250, 890, 260, 910, 260, 255, 255, 255,
00087                 //                              255);
00088                 //
00089                 //              // lower scroll-arrow
00090                 //              filledTrigonRGBA(surface, 900, 570, 890, 560, 910, 560, 255, 255, 255,
00091                 //                              255);
00092 
00093                 // scroll
00094                 //              if (static_cast<int> (files.size()) > 10) {
00095                 //                      boxRGBA(surface, 895, 265 + 300 / files.size()
00096                 //                                      * ((-this->scrollOffset) / 30), 905, 265 + (300
00097                 //                                      / files.size() * 10) + 300 / files.size()
00098                 //                                      * ((-this->scrollOffset) / 30), 255, 255, 255, 255);
00099                 //              } else {
00100                 //                      boxRGBA(surface, 895, 265, 905, 550, 255, 255, 255, 255);
00101                 //              }
00102 
00103         }
00104 
00105         if (this->menuChoice == HIGHSCORE) {
00106                 // background
00107                 boxRGBA(surface, 520, 180, 950, 450, 0, 0, 0, 100);
00108 
00109                 // menu active
00110                 Draw::text(surface, "Highscore", color, 100, 300, 90);
00111                 Draw::text(surface, "Highscore list", color, 650, 200);
00112 
00113                 ifstream openFile(Setting::HIGHSCORE.c_str());
00114                 string line;
00115                 int pos_y = 250;
00116                 while (!openFile.eof()) {
00117                         getline(openFile, line);
00118                         size_t find_pos = line.find_last_of(',');
00119                         Draw::text(surface, line.substr(0, find_pos), color, 550, pos_y, 24);
00120                         Draw::text(surface, line.substr(find_pos + 1), color, 850, pos_y,
00121                                         24);
00122                         pos_y = pos_y + 30;
00123                 }
00124                 openFile.close();
00125         }
00126 
00127         if (this->menuChoice == HELP) {
00128                 // background
00129                 boxRGBA(surface, 520, 180, 950, 450, 0, 0, 0, 100);
00130 
00131                 // menu active
00132                 Draw::text(surface, "Help", color, 100, 400, 90);
00133                 Draw::text(surface, "Help", color, 650, 200);
00134 
00135                 Draw::text(surface, "Defend your kingdom from delirious rebels", color,
00136                                 550, 250, 24);
00137                 Draw::text(surface, "by building tower around your country!", color,
00138                                 550, 280, 24);
00139                 Draw::text(surface, "Each tower have different specialty", color, 550,
00140                                 310, 24);
00141                 Draw::text(surface, "You must choose your tower wisely to", color, 550,
00142                                 340, 24);
00143                 Draw::text(surface, "be able to kill them!", color, 550, 370, 24);
00144         }
00145 
00146         if (this->menuChoice == INFORMATION) {
00147                 // background
00148                 boxRGBA(surface, 520, 180, 950, 450, 0, 0, 0, 100);
00149 
00150                 // menu active
00151                 Draw::text(surface, "Information", color, 100, 500, 90);
00152                 Draw::text(surface, "Information", color, 650, 200);
00153 
00154                 Draw::text(surface, "Proudly made by ", color, 550, 250, 24);
00155                 Draw::text(surface, "Mikeal Andersson and Han Lin Yap", color, 550,
00156                                 290, 24);
00157                 Draw::text(surface, "Release: 2009 December", color, 550, 330, 24);
00158                 Draw::text(surface, "Got a great map? Feel free to submit to us!",
00159                                 color, 550, 390, 24);
00160         }
00161

00163 
00164 void IntroState::keyPressed(SDLKey key) {
00165         this->reDraw = true;
00166 
00167         if (SDLK_1 == key) {
00168                 this->menuChoice = PLAYGAME;
00169         }
00170         if (SDLK_2 == key) {
00171                 this->menuChoice = HIGHSCORE;
00172         }
00173         if (SDLK_3 == key) {
00174                 this->menuChoice = HELP;
00175         }
00176         if (SDLK_4 == key) {
00177                 this->menuChoice = INFORMATION;
00178         }
00179         if (SDLK_5 == key || SDLK_ESCAPE == key) {
00180                 this->done = true;
00181         }
00182 }
00183 
00184 void IntroState::mousePressed(const int button, const int mouseX,
00185                 const int mouseY) {
00186         this->reDraw = true;
00187 
00188         if (mouseHit(mouseX, mouseY, 100, 200, 350, 90)) {
00189                 this->menuChoice = PLAYGAME;
00190                 this->scrollOffset = 0;
00191         } else if (mouseHit(mouseX, mouseY, 100, 300, 350, 90)) {
00192                 this->menuChoice = HIGHSCORE;
00193         } else if (mouseHit(mouseX, mouseY, 100, 400, 250, 90)) {
00194                 this->menuChoice = HELP;
00195         } else if (mouseHit(mouseX, mouseY, 100, 500, 400, 90)) {
00196                 this->menuChoice = INFORMATION;
00197         } else if (mouseHit(mouseX, mouseY, 100, 600, 250, 90)) {
00198                 // exit
00199                 this->done = true;
00200         }
00201 
00202         // Edit map
00203         if (mouseHit(mouseX, mouseY, 740, 640, 260, 50)) {
00204                 AbstractGameState* state = new EditMapState();
00205                 this->state = state;
00206         }
00207 
00208         if (this->menuChoice == PLAYGAME) {
00209                 // Map list
00210                 vector<string> files = AbstractGameState::getFilesInDir(
00211                                 Setting::MAP_DIR);
00212                 int x = 250 + this->scrollOffset;
00213                 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < files.size(); i++) {
00214                         string map = Setting::MAP_DIR + files[i];
00215                         if (x >= 250 && x <= 520) {
00216                                 if (mouseHit(mouseX, mouseY, 550, x, 250, 30)) {
00217                                         AbstractGameState* state = new PlayState();
00218                                         this->state = state;
00219                                         this->state->map->loadFile(map.c_str());
00220                                 }
00221                         }
00222                         x += 30;
00223                 }
00224 
00225                 // scrollbar
00226                 if (mouseHit(mouseX, mouseY, 890, 250, 20, 10)) {
00227                         if (this->scrollOffset < 0) {
00228                                 this->scrollOffset += 30;
00229                         }
00230                 } else if (mouseHit(mouseX, mouseY, 890, 560, 20, 10)) {
00231                         this->scrollOffset -= 30;
00232                 }
00233         }
00234 }
